jcr:content.browserTitle: Customer success stories and use cases | Adobe Audience Manager
jcr:content.metaDescription: See how Adobe Audience Manager lets you benefit from data-driven marketing to deliver personalized digital experiences for your customers.

text_532e.text: To help you partner with IT on digital transformation, read and share our IT Glossary and Conversation Guide for Adobe Audience Manager.

text_bf17.text: WestJet uses Adobe Audience Manager to personalize customer experiences and boost conversion rates.

text_3cd4.text: Join the eMarketer and Adobe webinar to solve the cross-device targeting mystery.

text_928b.text: Time Warner Cable uses Audience Manager with first-party data to create more personalized digital experiences.

text_e164.text: Use data and technology to simplify, clarify, and maximize your ad campaigns.

image_448c.alt: Read the Adobe and Digital Doughnut white paper Data Management Platforms Deciphered

text_9ffd.text: Read the Adobe and Digital Doughnut white paper Data Management Platforms Deciphered.

text_4f2a.text: Postmedia dramatically improves the reach of its targeted, revenue-driving campaigns with Audience Manager.

text_9d22.text: Customer experiences matter. Which means your DMP matters.

text_cd26.text: See why we are a Leader in The Forrester Wave™: Data Management Platforms, Q2 2017.

text_3256.text:
Let data drive your experiences.

No matter the industry, data enhances your ability to engage customers. See how various industries benefit from data-driven marketing.
